The young man is from another family. JIngrui's call him brother as well. He married daughter of marquis & princess.
Jingrui belongs to two families, remember? This is his father (the marquis who marry the princess).
The young man is from another family. JIngrui call him brother tho. He married marquis's daugther. Xie Bi,  is the son.
Duke Qing is on Yu's side, who is their enemy. Them (father & son in law )are on Crown Prince's side
